description:
PLEASE NOTE: Applicant must reside near the GREATER MINNEAPOLIS/ST. PAUL AREA MN area.

As our Senior Designer, you'll be the creative mastermind behind various collection concepts and products. You'll take ideas from a spark to impressive reality, working closely with our designers, production artists, and cross-functional teams. You're a self-starter who can assume multiple projects and deadlines with ease.

WHAT YOU’LL DO:

Design Magic: From concept to packaging, you'll handle color, graphic design, and product application. Your creativity knows no bounds.

Trend Hunter: Stay ahead of the game by researching current print, graphic, and design trends. Market shopping, trend reviews, and cultural research are your playground.

Team Collaborator: Work with our design and product development teams to bring your creative vision to life. Communication is key!

Mentor Extraordinaire: Help junior designers grow by providing training, development, and feedback.

Project Owner: Take full ownership of your work, ensuring every detail is perfect and meets our high standards.

Adobe Whiz: Keep everything organized and on track using your expert knowledge of design software (Adobe Creative Suite) and our PLM system.

WHAT YOU BRING:

7+ years of designing consumer products.
A degree in Product, or Graphic Design.
Mastery of Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, and InDesign).
Experience in art direction and creative leadership.
A sharp eye for trends, color, and design.
Strong understanding of product design and printing techniques.

Strong understanding of product design.
Ability to distinguish layout/typography, apply color theory, hierarchy and balance.
Knowledge of 4-color process printing, as well as spot color printing and various printing techniques.
Clear understanding of die lines and technical drawings.

Ability to work independently and accept client feedback like a pro.
Excellent communication and organization skills.
A passion for continuous learning and professional development.

WHY YOU’LL LOVE IT HERE:

Be part of a team that's always innovating and creating.
Work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment where no two days are the same.
Opportunities for growth and development.
Competitive salary and benefits package.

If you're ready to make your mark and create beautiful, unique products, we'd love to hear from you!
